con: <div><p><img src="http://p9.pstatp.com/large/320d00021a28eb5dde1f" img_width="1946" img_height="600" alt="2017农村养老保险：这4大新规关系你的养老金，不看要吃亏！" inline="0"></p><p>【进入我们的头条，就可以免费咨询法律问题哦】</p><p>随着我国农村人口老龄化问题逐渐加重，农村养老问题已经成为社会关注的话题。相较于城镇居民养老，农村养老问题更加突出，尤其是独生子女家庭。物价飞涨，当农村的老人丧失了劳动能力，子女又在外务工，他们的生活就很容易陷入困境。为了更好的保障大家的老年生活，农村的养老保险规定也一直在调整。2017年新农保改革就有两大亮点，一个是筹资模式有了重大改变，另一个是养老金待遇有了重大调整。如此一来，农村养老保险有了几大变化。</p><p>一、新农保出台了养老贷款的政策</p><p><img src="http://p3.pstatp.com/large/37e80004f7e28896cb4c" img_width="333" img_height="196" alt="2017农村养老保险：这4大新规关系你的养老金，不看要吃亏！" inline="0"></p><p> 在2017年新农保改革后，部分贫困地区的农民不用交钱也能享受养老保险了，这种养老贷款主要是面向失地农民（被依法征地后，家庭人均耕种面积少于0.3亩）的，男性年满60周岁，女性年满55周岁，在失地当月起就可以领取养老保险金，个人不再缴费。</p><p> 男性在45-60岁之间，女性在40-55周岁之间的，年缴费额度是100-800档次，其中政府交纳50%以上，集体交纳30%，失地农民个人负担20%。自己负担的20%就可以通过养老贷款来缴纳，到时候也不需要自己攒钱还，这部分钱会直接从到时候领取的养老金中按月扣除，所以失地农民不需缴纳养老保险就可享受养老金。</p><p>二、可以一次性缴纳养老保险</p><p><img src="http://p3.pstatp.com/large/37e90001acde9ba8af2b" img_width="328" img_height="198" alt="2017农村养老保险：这4大新规关系你的养老金，不看要吃亏！" inline="0"></p><p> 按照国家规定，养老保险要求累计缴纳15年，但是农村人的工作状态很难交满15年，所以就有了一次性补缴的政策。只要男满45岁、女满40岁的农民就能够进行补缴，最高只能够补缴10年，而男满60岁、女满55岁的农民，则能够补缴15年。</p><p> 这对那些手头宽裕一些的农民来说还是很方便的，一次性缴纳10万块钱左右的养老金，就可以到岁数后每月领取1300元的养老金了。假如农民朋友交够了养老保险，突然因为某些原因离开人世了，那么其个人所交的养老保险金是所有继承人都是可以继承的。</p><p>三、80周岁以上的老人高龄津贴增加</p><p><img src="http://p1.pstatp.com/large/37e80004f7e19ad037a3" img_width="314" img_height="207" alt="2017农村养老保险：这4大新规关系你的养老金，不看要吃亏！" inline="0"></p><p> 到目前为止已有26个省市出台了这个政策，而且高龄津贴在普遍上涨。高龄津贴是指在80周岁以上的老人，每个月除了养老金外还可以领取几百元的高龄津贴。高龄津贴发放标准，原则上按照各地低保标准、补助水平和发放对象的年龄实行分类分档发放，并随当地经济社会发展、群众生活水平的提高和低保标准变动情况适时进行调整。</p><p>四、年满60周岁老人零缴费也能参保</p><p><img src="http://p9.pstatp.com/large/37ef000196560350acb3" img_width="296" img_height="220" alt="2017农村养老保险：这4大新规关系你的养老金，不看要吃亏！" inline="0"></p><p> 年满60周岁以上的城乡居民，本人不缴费也可按月领取基础养老金，标准为每人每月80元，比国家每人每月55元的标准高出25元。虽然数目不多，但是也能减少子女赡养老人的压力。但60岁以上老人不缴费享受基础养老金也是有条件的，其符合参保条件的子女必须按新政策参保缴费，已参加其他社会养老保险则视为已参保缴费。</p><p>如果你有还有法律相关的问题或者需要律师帮助的，欢迎请进入我们的头条咨询我们的律师！</p><p>==================================</p><p>温馨提示：</p><p><strong>进入我们的头条号</strong></p><p><strong>即可咨询在线律师</strong></p><p><img src="http://p3.pstatp.com/large/37ea00019b5bd1696e52" img_width="1080" img_height="1704" alt="2017农村养老保险：这4大新规关系你的养老金，不看要吃亏！" inline="0"></p></div>

With the aging of the rural population in China gradually increased, the problem of rural pension has become a topic of social concern. Compared with the urban residents pension, rural pension problem is more prominent, especially the only child family. Prices soaring, when the rural elderly lost their ability to work, their children in foreign workers, their life is very easy to get into trouble. In order to better protect everyone's old age, rural old-age insurance regulations have been adjusted. 2017 new agricultural security reform there are two bright spots, one is the financing model has been a major change, the other is a major pension treatment has been adjusted. As a result, the rural old-age insurance has made several changes.None

First, the new agricultural insurance introduced the policy of pension loansNone

In 2017 after the reform of the new agricultural insurance, some poor areas of farmers do not have to pay can also enjoy the old-age insurance, and this pension is mainly for the landless farmers (according to the law after the land, the per capita farming area of ​​less than 0.3 acres) Men over 60 years of age, women over 55 years of age, in the month of land can receive pension insurance, individuals no longer pay.None

Men between 45-60 years of age, women in the 40-55 years of age, the annual payment amount is 100-800 grade, of which the government to pay more than 50%, collectively pay 30%, landless farmers personal burden of 20%. 20% of their own burden can be paid through the pension loans, when they do not need to save money also, this part of the money will be paid directly from the time to the monthly deduction, so the landless peasants do not need to pay pension insurance can be Enjoy the pension.None

Second, you can pay a one-time pension insuranceNone

In accordance with state regulations, pension insurance required to pay a total of 15 years, but the working conditions of rural people is difficult to pay for 15 years, so there is a one-time payment policy. As long as the men over 45 years of age, 40-year-old farmers can be paid, the maximum can only be paid for 10 years, and men over 60 years old, 55-year-old farmers, you can pay 15 years.None

This is enough for some of the farmers who are still very convenient, one-time payment of about 100,000 dollars of pension, you can go to the age of 1,300 yuan a month after the pension. If the farmer friend enough to endowment insurance, suddenly for some reason to leave the world, then the individual paid the pension insurance is all heirs are inherited.None

Third, over 80 years old age allowance for the elderly increasedNone

So far, 26 provinces and municipalities have introduced this policy, and the Old Age Allowance has generally risen. Old age allowance refers to the elderly over 80 years of age, each month in addition to pension can also receive a few hundred dollars old age allowance. OAA standards, in principle, in accordance with the minimum subsistence allowances standards, the level of subsidies and the release of the object of the classification of the classification of the release, and with the local economic and social development, the improvement of the standard of living and minimal changes in the standard changes in a timely manner.None

Fourth, over 60 years old people can pay zero payNone

Over 60 years of urban and rural residents over the age of 10, I can not pay the basic monthly pension, the standard for 80 yuan per person per month, 55 yuan per person per month higher than the standard 25 yuan. Although the number is small, but also can reduce the pressure on their children to support the elderly. But the elderly over the age of 60 do not pay the basic pension is also conditional, and their children meet the conditions of insured must pay according to the new policy, has participated in other social pension insurance is deemed to have paid insurance.None
